name: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (I)
achievementgroup: Inazuma: The Islands of Thunder and Eternity - Series I

stage1.title: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (I)
stage1.description: Complete 6 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

stage2.title: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (I)
stage2.description: Complete 12 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.

stage3.title: Lightning-Riding Adventurer (I)
stage3.description: Complete 24 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges on Narukami Island, Kannazuka, and Yashiori Island in Inazuma.
